description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Aliens, Humans, and Robots collide! Play one of the pre-loaded game maps, or create your own mayhem using the Level Editor. Choose your faction and complete wave-by-wave of increasingly difficult enemy personnel. Manage your personnel by making the most out of points received by purchasing ammo, upgrades, special abilities, and vehicles. Make use of cover and towers to win the War of Absolution.
description.short: Aliens, Humans, and Robots collide! Play one of the pre-loaded game maps, or create your own mayhem using the Level Editor. Choose your faction and complete wave-by-wave of increasingly difficult enemy personnel. Manage your personnel by making the most out of points received by purchasing ammo, upgrades, special abilities, and vehicles. Make use of cover and towers to win the War of Absolution.
